reviewText:
Saw this movie on TV with my family.

I am going to buy it for my mother on Mother's Day. Great story about never forgetting your roots and happiness is always at home.

Love movies that I feel are family oriented, good story and clean language.  So much geared to the "X" rated.  Am always delighted to purchase Hallmark movies.  This story was heartfelt, military families would especially relate to.  Have seen it several times!!!!
Thankyou
We saw this movie and just had to buy it. It's our favorite Hallmark movie, even above come dance at my wedding!
Great movie, heartwarming
EXELLENT!
Great and awe inspring film with Austin a super actor...
Good family entertainment.
Very, very good movie.
Great story and really liked how the story kept going to the past to bring the truth out to the characters into the present day.
Good family movie
All great
Real good movie and it arrived on time.
Great movie, great story - truly enjoyed it.

Shuffleton's Barbershop was an exceptional movie.  It showed how we sometimes misinterprete something, especially when we are teenagers.  It is an amazing story about redemption and the amazing love of family.
Love this Movie
Love this movie
Call me a softie, but this movie always makes me cry.  An universal story about families, misunderstandings,  redemption and forgiveness, with restrained yet great acting.  Great  movie.

Good picture and family oriented for the most part; Glover was great as always; very good message; enjoyed watching but the downside  is that the underlying plot  is overused and therefore very predictable;  but the ending was too sudden  --- felt like they ran out of time or screenplay and someone yelled "cut" ;  in spite of somewhat significant  loose ends left hanging in the story line.
We love this movie and is is family friendly.
Great movie
Great heartwarming family movie. About bringing a family back together.
enjoyed traveling back in time to a small town experience, along with great music
Good family movie!
This is another fantastic Hallmark movie. It is always nice to watch a movie that teaches a lesson and still entertains.
The movie was really good.
Really good movie
I thoroughly enjoyed this movie.  Very good plot and I loved the music!  I very seldom watch a Hallmark movie that I do not like.
The movie was excellent and is a "must see" for all!  The dvd arrived promptly, in great shape, and just as advertised.  Seller is great!
I like Hallmark movies they never disappoint me. This was a good movie with Danny Glover. I enjoyed this a lot.
I enjoyed this DVD, but expected to get bored and never finish it,  Sometimes the titles like this seem too predictable .  This one held its own with a great story and ending.  Almost a tear jerker!

i love this movie. the first time i saw it i fell in love and had to buy it.ive actually noticed its been broadcast under different titles. Its sweet and lovely and i bought it so i could watch it whenever i want. I love hallmark movies. i will eventually own them all.
Saw this, enjoyed it. Sat with spouse and they watched and enjoyed too. Was in condition discribed to be.
This is a very good film very good film indeed
We found it interesting, not as predictable as some. This is one we would watch again.
Ok
received as promised . will look forward to buying  from this seller in the near future. very pleased with my order. thank you.
A very good movie, and recommend it to anyone.

So many will say one person cannot make a difference.  Yet most of us have a person who made a great difference in our lives.  If not watching this movie may help you discover who to look for,  in our times where so many are angry and afraid this movie reminds us that the answer will not come through programs and promises, but one heart at a time as we care for each other.
Good Movie I really enjoyed it.
Wonderful movie, actors were great, beautiful lessons on love & forgiveness in families and friends
